result.reason: Feature request to add automatic cloud backup and restore for connection data.
result.approach: Design and implement a modular system for cloud integration, allowing users to configure automatic backups and manual restore from supported cloud storage providers. This would involve adding new UI elements, configuration options, and a service layer to interact with cloud APIs.
